>> N = []

for i = 1:12
    A = MatBuild(.1, 1*10^i);
    x = cond(A, inf);
    N = [N x];
end

>> format long
N'
ans =

   1.0e+24 *

   0.000000000000000    Beta = 10^1
   0.000000000000000
   0.000000000000000
   0.000000000000000
   0.000000000000020
   0.000000000002000
   0.000000000200000
   0.000000020000001
   0.000002000000012
   0.000200000000115
   0.020000000001150
   2.000000000011500    Beta = 10^12
